title: Silver Adc LFT
body:
Hey,
Looking for a new team peaked at sliver 1 last season
mostly a vayne main but can play other champs
pm me in game if you want to pick me up

replies.body:
hey man, i'm making a silver ranked team, the lanes left are adc and jg. So you could join, you would have to pick a variety of champs if you join. I posted my discussion before called "looking to make silver ranked team" by M Zadows. So yeah
Hope you wanna join

M Zadows
